meanings.definition: A person or thing that makes a loud, rattling noise.
meanings.sent1: The clatterer of pots and pans in the kitchen woke up the whole house.
meanings.sent2: The clatterer of the falling dishes startled the cat.
meanings.sent3: The clatterer of the wind chimes outside played a noisy melody.
meanings.sent4: The clatterer of the construction site echoed through the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The clatterer of the old typewriter brought back memories of a bygone era.

meanings.definition: Someone who talks noisily or at length.
meanings.sent1: The clatterer in the classroom never let anyone else speak.
meanings.sent2: The clatterer at the party dominated every conversation.
meanings.sent3: The clatterer in the library whispered loudly to themselves.
meanings.sent4: The clatterer in the office could be heard from across the hall.
meanings.sent5: The clatterer in the group discussion never seemed to run out of words.
